div.div:
cotton - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 3.0.14
Great have it on all my Galaxies
The best weather and clock widget available. Looks great on my Galaxy S III and Galaxy Tab 10.1, but on my Galaxy Player 5.0 the original look changes alot when my screen rotate.

Brett - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 3.0.14
Not working with S3
No matter how many restarts I do, the widgets do not appear in the list. Spent money for nothing. Please fix!

Jerrod - July 4, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 3.0.14
4x2 Widget
I am on an HTC inspire with a custom ics rom. The 4x2 widget says its a 5x2 widget and won't fit. 3 stars until fixed.

Doug - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.14
Fixed all the bugs
Finally fixed the clock to display properly on nexus. Choosing weather sources is nice, and complete customization of utility switches is great.

Stuart - July 4, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF300 with version 3.0.14
Looks really good
Looks really nice, would be great if you could also include other widgets, i.e. "Schedule display" so I can make my home page look all the same.

Keith - July 4, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF201 with version 3.0.14
Works great
Paired w/ beautiful widget and ADW couldn't ask for more .And the updates just keep getting better.

Pedro - July 4, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 3.0.14
Great looking widgets!
Awesome UI!

Evan - July 4, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 3.0.14
Gorgeous and functional
Great app, looks great, works great and is super configurable. Well done and well worth a couple bucks

James - June 27, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.13
Awesome widgets
I got this app when I first got my galaxy nexus and lived it then, and the new 3.0 update has added and fixed everything I felt was missing before. Hands down the best widget app out there. Looks great and almost every aspect of each app is customisable. If you get another widget app you are missing out.

Tom - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.13
Great but....
Decent widgets. Could use better skins. Also I'm not impressed by the switches. The GPS switch brings you to the settings page, instead of toggling on/off. Touching the clock brings you to clock app not alarm like beautiful widgets does. Almost 5 stars. Recommended for sure.

Mikkel - July 1, 2012 - Galaxy S Plus with version 3.0.13
Amazing app
This is an amazing app. It makes browsing in my phone so much easier and is beautiful at the same time. I would recommend this for all who are interested in changing how your phone looks.

Bryan - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 3.0.13
HD Widgets
Waited till after beta version but all the hype for what? I used Beautiful Widgets B4 & will still do so. The weather comes from same source but BW more detailed for me. I can have my own small village & lots of places but for HD only 1 place which isn't my home but another. Village nearby. My post code is apparently 13 miles away . Not interested to have so many shades of colours .

Kunal - June 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.13
Invasive permissions
Why are contact data permissions required when there is no widget for contacts?

Byron - June 27, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 3.0.13
Payed and installed BUT...
No matter how many system restarts I do it does not show up in widget list. Samsung galaxy s3. I will change to 5 star if someone can help.. At the moment though I have paid for nothing.

Eric - June 27, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 3.0.13
Best clock app
If you like changing the look of your clock, this is so much better than B. W. You can customize to your hearts content and the quality of the widgets is excellent. Give it a shot and spend the time to see all of the different things you can do.

Deborah - July 1, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 3.0.13
HD version fixed for Droid X
App is fixed and runs on Droid X again. Reinstalled and all is well. :-) Thanks!

Janet - June 30, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 3.0.13
Great App
Very nice looking app. Would be better if it allowed users to download a 2nd copy that could be set to a different location. Other copies always default to 1st location. We have relatives in Sydney and it would be nice to also see their weather on the desktop.

Jenifer - July 1, 2012 - Version 3.0.13
Beautiful and FUN!
Love the ability to fully customize. But the weather 1x1 widget stays white. The background color changes, but no matter what color I make the "cloud" it stays white. HTC Amaze.

Ismael - June 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.13
Update messed up the size
Ever since the new "major update" they screwed up the size of the clock. Now it's way too small. It looks weird on my Galaxy Nexus. Why did they do that? Its like taking the engine out of a Ferrari and replacing it with a pineapple! Why? Please fix....-1 star if I could!

Sean - June 29, 2012 - Version 3.0.13
Unusable on Sansung galaxy S2
Cannot use this since update all widgets cannot be placed on screen even 1x1...says not enough room on Samsung Galaxy SII

Craig - June 29, 2012 - Version 3.0.13
Android alarms for clock change
Great app, love it. But, why does it call for a system alarm every time the clock changes? It's wakes the phone out of deep sleep and crushes the battery.

Denislav - June 30, 2012 - Version 3.0.13
gggg
latest not working perfekt ics 4.04.Drayne my battery and phone freezing.my launcher is nemus launcher

T

but the weather alert icon won't go away.

IAN - July 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.13
TASTY
Man,these widgets are gorgeous. Glassy,classy and yummy-HD Widgets.

Pupu - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.13
Great update to a great app
I've between using this app for a long time. The only problem that I faced was that to see the weathers of other cities, you had to use the browser. Now weathers of my favourite cities are accessible on the app itself. Great job. Keep on improving.

Will - June 29, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF201 with version 3.0.13
Fantastic

JohnD - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 3.0.13
ICS / Google Nexus S - Problems
This app, when used with the latest Android OS (ICS 4.0.4), presents problems - for us poor users - which is not highlighted or allude to on the pre-sales information. Instead, we have to have protracted email conversation with the developers - no matters how good the developers are, this 'debugging process' is becoming all to common when load apps on ICS and, it is incredibly annoying! Update: just got the app working - the install failed to install any widgets... unreliable install.

Joshua - June 27, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 3.0.13
Needs more switches.
What? NO switches for email, fb, txt msg etc., c'mon...

Seraph - June 30, 2012 - Version 3.0.13
Great Widgets
I love these widgets for their customization options. There are other options, but this one is laid out very well and has a very smooth feel. My one wish would be the ability to tap the date in the header widget to open my calendar. There is a setting that suggests that this should be the behavior, but it doesn't seem to work. Other than that, definitely 5 stars. Running on an AT&T Galaxy S II with CM9.

Craig - June 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.13
Settings don't change
I checked celcius in widget in app settings an it still shows fareheit even when it checked for celcius, c'mon is it that hard.I lucky I have beautiful an premium widgets to rely on instead of this garbage.

The guide says that there should be a save button on the top right, but I can't see one and have tried a number of different ways to save but none work :o( If anyone knows it please let me know

.

But doesn't work all that well in reality for people using launcher replacements and custom grid sizes. I can't find a decent sized widget now. Therefore I must find a new app which is disappointing since when I purchased this one, it worked great for my needs.

Andy

Would be better

Daniel - June 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.12
New update.
I am having zero issues with the new update. I have used every update to the beta and now the release version and all is fine. Good job!

James - June 23, 2012 - Version 3.0.12
Very Elegant Widgets
Galaxy Nexus ICS... At first I had a problem with fonts not fitting in the clock widget, but found that reducing the size of ICS system fonts in the phone settings solved this, and it works great. Developers are good about responding and working hard on improvements. Excellent job. Love the app. Worth the price. Looking forward to future theme pack releases.

E - June 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.12
Latest update problem
Verizon Samsung Galaxy Nexus with 4.0.4 0n LiquidROM Tried multiple Nexus phones and always get, "No more room on this home screen" when trying to place a widget; even if the screen has nothing else on it. Widget size doesn't matter either, just won't place. emailed the developer and am hoping he fixes this. It is a great program, but now I cannot use it. :-( Update: Developer responded, thank you! This is because I am using Apex Launcher! OK, now I'm going to see if Apex can do, or suggest, anything.

Kelly - June 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 3.0.12
Wonderful but...
I would love to be able to change the font color of the location and weather details. White doesn't always work. Plus is a HUGE battery drain.

Mutu - June 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.0.12
Poor design
As long as this should be beautiful, is not. The clock numbers are not fitted inside the squares, and the combination is far from being beautiful

Ver - June 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.0.12
weather shrunk and clock too big
i wouldnt have updated if i knew this would happen. the 5x5 widget has an oversized clock with a disproportionately small weather. i totally hate it. to remedy this, i have increased the # of rows of my homescreen (using a custom launcher) then added a 5x2 header for the clock then added a 5x5 weather only widget. pls fix this in the next update...

Reset - June 23, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 3.0.12
Excellent....and Beautiful.
This is how Android ICS should look and work. Quality throughout. Astonishing value. Developers elsewhere please note. This style, if extended to include other existing apps within a unified theme, like the planned Chameleons using Kickstarter, is the way to go. You have the style and skill....android tablets need a uniform page rather than lads of different style widgets. Create a unified page with all selected apps under your stylistic umbrela. Nice.

leon - June 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.12
HTC kills the need of this application
I Have an HTC phone and I don't need these widgets. None of them are really any better than the stock widgets.

Kevin - June 22, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 3.0.12
Temp notification
Could you please implement a temperature notification option? Only reason I gave 4 stars, its the one thing I miss from beautiful widgets. But otherwise this is way nicer than beautiful widgets almost all around! Thanks for the great development

Peter - June 27, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 3.0.12
Nice Widgets
Overall Widgets are nice. Still some kinks need ironing out but a good product.

t3chn0s1s - June 23, 2012 - Acer Picasso with version 3.0.12
Absolutely GORGEOUS!
Loving the most recent update! The customization options on this are undeniably beautiful. Love the new font options, especially the much needed Roboto font! Loving this app even more than I already do.

Andi - June 22, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 3.0.12
This app was great until the last 2 updates
Now my 1x1 switches hardly ever show up and my larger widgets disappear a lot. Droid X.

Vu - June 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.12
Superb!
I wanted a 4x1 header widget similar to the one in HTC's Sense 4 UI and HD Widgets gave me that option. Additionally, there are many other customizeable options to choose for. Well worth the price and highly recommended.

Kevin - June 26, 2012 - Motorola XOOM with version 3.0.12
Battery killer
I love the widgets and they enhance my Razr Maxx and my Xoom. Both are running ICS and HD widgets are a huge drain on the battery. Without using it at work, Xoom drained 50%. With them not in use, the drain wS 10 %. The drain was similar on the Maxx. Fix this and I will update the score to 5 stars.

Stephen - June 22, 2012 - Version 3.0.12
Extremely good! Highly recommended!
Takes some effort to master, but has the ability to create beautiful and well designed widgets that are superior to even HTC Sense widgets. Highly recommend!!! Makes my phone look wonderful!

finepics - June 21, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 3.0.12
5 stars

-

Michael - June 20, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 3.0.12
Awesome.

RDC - June 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.12
Excellent.
Much nicer than beautiful widgets and fancy widgets. Having the choice of four weather providers is also brilliant. You don't get live wallpaper or weather effects like you do in the others but it makes up for it with low RAM and battery use and the clocks look really sharp on your desktop. It follows your location no problem too. You CAN make your own 4x1 switches, just tap on the top right when selecting the switch and you can pick your own items to show.

xlynch - June 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.12
Nice Widget Samsung Note
So this widget is pretty sharp, little confusing at first need to follow the on screen instructions before you begin. App is sharp and clear does give you several options to custom color y our widgets individualy for $2.00 its work the price. I would have given 5 stars but the UI is a little confusing.

Unlisted Vector - June 26, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 3.0.12
